1.title: The Name That Started a War
1.plot: The gypsy sisters are making some big changes! Now living under one roof, Kayla and Annie are enjoying the single life; a pregnant Mellie has moved in with Kayla and Annie leaving Nettie and JoAnn to question her allegiance which reignites old wounds.

2.title: Dirty Little Secrets: Exposed!
2.plot: Mellie's beau gets in a fight with the father of her second child while she's in labor. Later, the women find out who's been spreading rumors about them on a gossip site.

3.title: Desperate Times Call for Desperate Measures
3.plot: A fight erupts when Kayla, Annie and Mellie confront Nettie over her trash-talking online, and the situation escalates into legal action, so JoAnn asks her sister to help restore peace in the family.

4.title: A Drum, a Rattle, and a Gypsy Battle
4.plot: A spiritual session is planned by Dovie for the women to work out their issues, but things go from bad to worse when a fight breaks out between Dallas and Annie.

5.title: On the Ranch, Off the Rails!
5.plot: The women go to a dude ranch, where they do everything from cleaning stalls to herding cattle, but most of all they have to learn to work together to be successful.

6.title: The Call That Changed It All
6.plot: The dude ranch adventure continues until a call in the middle of the night brings tragic news that changes the women's lives.

7.title: The First Ladies of Bling Take DC!
7.plot: The girls rally around Nettie who is still dealing with the loss of her son. In an attempt to return to normalcy, Mellie asks Nettie to plan Brandy's baptism and the girls take on DC to celebrate Kayla's birthday, and learn some history along the way...

8.title: Wildest, Craziest, OMG Moments
8.plot: Memorable moments from past seasons, including epic fights and ostentatious celebrations, are recalled in the Season 4 finale.

1.title: Highway to Hell
1.plot: Matriarch Nettie Stanley worries that her sister Mellie's stripping and fighting are getting dangerously out of hand. Meanwhile, Mellie's ex-boyfriend Robbie comes back to town. And later, Kayla's trip to the racetrack is derailed by Mellie's drinking.

2.title: Blood Is Thicker Than Bling
2.plot: Nettie and Kayla get in a huge fight over who will get to plan Mellie's wedding. Kayla and her husband are at odds over how to raise their teenage daughter. When Mellie's ex-con mother gets released from jail, it threatens Mellie's newfound sobriety.

3.title: The Queen of All Cons
3.plot: Mellie and Robbie set a wedding date. Laura plans a 15th anniversary party for Kayla and Richard. Mellie worries when Nettie insists on throwing her a bachelorette party - a road trip with their cousin Annie to Ocean City that gets wildly out of control.

4.title: Wedded for Disaster
4.plot: Nettie, Kayla, and Laura suspect Mellie may be pregnant, despite Mellie's adamant denial. Nettie and Lottie Mae refuse to speak to one another, and with Mellie's wedding day looming, Mellie starts to have serious doubts about everything!

5.title: Wedded for Disaster
5.plot: Mellie's honeymoon phase is short-lived; a pregnancy complication sends her to the hospital, AND she faces jail time! Kayla and Richard must contend with fourteen-year-old daughter Danielle dating an older gypsy boy.

6.title: Who's Your Daddy?
6.plot: Tensions are high when Nettie, Kayla and Mellie get into a raging fight just before Mellie's baby shower celebration. With the date of her prison sentence looming, Mellie has a lot of decisions to make regarding Robbie, her baby, and her future.

7.title: All Is Fair in Gypsy War
7.plot: Tensions are high when Nettie, Kayla and Mellie get into a raging fight just before Mellie's baby shower celebration. With the date of her prison sentence looming, Mellie has a lot of decisions to make regarding Robbie, her baby, and her future.

1.title: The Calm Before the Storm
1.plot: Nettie and Kayla fight; JoAnn travels to Martinsburg to help defuse the tension; Mellie meets her father; Nettie finds out her daughter has run off with her ex-boyfriend again.

2.title: Fist of Fury
2.plot: The drama between Nettie Stanley and her cousin Kayla reaches a boiling point, ending in an all-out gypsy fight. Upon her release from jail, a pregnant Mellie receives an unexpected phone call. Meanwhile, three new Gypsy family members invade Martinsburg.

3.title: The Blame Game
3.plot: As the family stands firmly divided, Nettie learns an unsettling truth, and confronts Sheena on her allegiance. JoAnn devises a plan to rebuild Nettie and Kayla's relationship. Later, Mellie reaches out to Kayla for forgiveness.

4.title: Making Up Is Hard to Do
4.plot: After receiving her pleading phone call, Kayla reluctantly agrees to meet with Mellie. Meanwhile, Nettie decides it's time to lay the family feud to rest, and meets with Sheena to bridge the gap. Later, Nettie rushes an agonizing Mellie to the hospital.

5.title: A Newborn King
5.plot: After countless false alarms, Mellie finally goes into labor. As a last ditch effort, a remorseful Nettie decides to send Kayla a DVD, pleading for forgiveness. Later, Annie and Sheena help Kayla prepare for the chili cook off.

6.title: The Family That Plays Together, Stays Together
6.plot: After viewing Nettie's apology video, Kayla agrees to meet with her. They decide a road trip is just the thing to unite the family. Along the way, a visit to an animal park proves this group is wilder than the park's inhabitants!

7.title: Gypsies Unleashed
7.plot: As the road trip comes to an end; Robbie makes a surprise appearance in Tennessee. Back in Martinsburg, JoAnn and Sheena decide to plan a girl's day trip to a winery to keep the fun going. But no outing is complete without a dramatic Mellie outburst!

8.title: It's Been One Long, Hot Summer
8.plot: As the summer ends, the ladies settle into their new beginnings. Kayla organizes a luau bash for the clan; Mellie plans a baptism for baby Richard; Sheena & Annie mend their marriages. Later at the luau, Mellie lashes out at JoAnn-who finally fights back.

1.title: Birthdays, Brawls, and Big Reveals
1.plot: In the Season 3 premiere, Kayla and Nettie are fighting again after months of reconciliation. Meanwhile, Kayla plans a birthday party with a belly-dancing theme; Mellie takes her baby to visit his dad; and a secret's revealed on the way to the racetrack.

2.title: Off to the Races... Again!
2.plot: Nettie confides in JoAnn about her fight with Mellie, who shares her side of the story with Kayla. Later, Mellie takes her baby to visit his father; and Kayla shares a secret on the way to the racetrack.

3.title: Bottoms Up in the Big Easy
3.plot: The women go to New Orleans to celebrate Mellie and Kayla's birthdays, which includes plenty of shopping and partying all night long.

4.title: Bourbon Street Brawls
4.plot: A sightseeing tour of New Orleans includes haunted houses and a visit to a voodoo shop, but tempers flare when Mellie and Annie are ready to start drinking.

5.title: The Little Gypsy Prince Turns 1!
5.plot: The New Orleans trip ends and the women head home, where Kayla confronts Richard about their failed marriage, and Mellie and Dallas throw a combined birthday party for their sons.

6.title: A Marriage Unraveling
6.plot: Kayla meets with Richard to discuss the status of their marriage after weeks of living apart. Later, Mellie, Nettie and JoAnn go canoeing with the kids for some fun in the sun.

7.title: 'I Do'...Take 2!
7.plot: Kayla shares exciting news with the family that she and Richard are engaged-again-so Nettie and the others start planning a party for Kayla, but some of them secretly worry that the happy couple won't last.

8.title: Surprise
8.plot: The women go to Ocean City, Md., for Kayla's bachelorette party, but their beach festivities are interrupted by a call from Richard that causes Kayla to have doubts about their future.

9.title: A Naughty or Nice Christmas?
9.plot: It's Christmas time and the Gypsy Sisters are ready to kick off the festivities! But not everyone's in the holiday spirit. Kayla decides to trump Nettie's costume party with her own themed celebration. Later, Mellie reveals a special secret to the family.

imdb.plot outline: Wild and wonderful West Virginia is the setting for the blinged-out brouhaha. Mother hen Nettie is keeping a close eye on Mellie, whose behavior lately has been anything but proper for a young, single gypsy woman. Mellie's making a living and searching for love. Meanwhile, Kayla's house is a nonstop circus since she's taken in Laura's family. When the four women get together, whether it's for a little fun or for some serious family business, the fists come out.

When the four women get together, whether it's for a little fun or for some serious family business, the fists come out.::TLC
